Package com.stasroshchenko.clinic.controller

package com.stasroshchenko.clinic.controller
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    HomeController
    The controller works with Home page, all the requests by "localhost:8080/" come into this controller.
    LoginController
    Works with Login page, all the requests that income either to "localhost:8080/login" or to "localhost:8080/login-error" are passed to this controller.
    RegistrationController
    Works with Registration page, all the requests at "localhost:8080/registration" are proceeded in this controller
    VerificationController
    Works with Verification page, all the requests at "localhost:8080/verification" will be proceeded in this controller.
    VisitController
    Works with all the POST requests incoming in "localhost:8080/visit".
